name: Defense From The Breach
description:
Attention Soldier! We've got an extra-terrestrial threat on our doorstep, and we need YOU to take 'em all out!

Use the two class system - Simple and Dynamic - to make your way through the invasion and overwhelm them!

Purchase new abilities to find more pathways, or to take out those monsters with ease!

Hope to see you soon soldier!

(Please note, this game is a prototype/work in progress. There may be issues present here. Any feedback is much appreciated!)
